file.name: notify-api-2.0.0.yaml
file.content:
---
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: SBC Notify API Reference
  description: BC Registries Notify API reference documentation
  version: 2.0.0
paths:
  /api/v1/notify/:notification_id:
    get:
      tags:
        - Notification
      summary: Get Notification details
      description: Get Notification details
      operationId: Get_Notification
      parameters:
        - name: notification_id
          in: path
          description: Notification Id
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          headers:
            X-Application-Context:
              schema:
                type: string
              description: X-Application-Context
              examples:
                notify_1:
                  value: '1'
            Access-Control-Allow-Origin:
              schema:
                type: string
              description: Access-Control-Allow-Origin
              examples:
                notify_1:
                  value: '*'
            Access-Control-Allow-Methods:
              schema:
                type: string
              description: Access-Control-Allow-Methods
              examples:
                notify_1:
                  value: 'GET, POST'
            Access-Control-Allow-Headers:
              schema:
                type: string
              description: Access-Control-Allow-Headers
              examples:
                notify_1:
                  value: 'Content-Type, api_key, Authorization'

          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/NotifyResponse'
              examples:
                notify_1:
                  value: '{
                            "id": 1,
                            "recipients": "test@abc.com",
                            "requestDate": "2019-09-25T09:08:57.515479+00:00",
                            "sentDate": "2019-09-26T09:34:34.792527+00:00",
                            "recipients": "string",
                            "notifyType": {
                                "code": "EMAIL",
                                "desc": "The Email type of notification"
                            },
                             "notifyStatus": {
                                "code": "DELIVERED",
                                "desc": "Status for the notification sent successful"
                             },
                             "contents": {
                                "subject": "test notify",
                                "body": "hello world!"
                             }
                          }'
        '400':
          description: BadRequest
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorResponse'
    parameters:
      - name: notification_id
        in: path
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        examples:
          notify_1:
            value: 1

  /api/v1/notify/:
    post:
      tags:
      - Notification
      summary: Create Notification record
      description: Create Notification record
      operationId: Create_Notification
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/NotifyRequest'
            examples:
                notify_post_1:
                  value : '{
                              "recipients": "test@abc.com",
                              "contents": {
                                "subject": "test notify",
                                "body": "hello world!",
                                "attachmentName": "",
                                "attachmentBytes": "",
                                "attachmentUrl": ""
                              }
                            }'
        required: true
      responses:
        '201':
          description: Created
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/NotifyResponse'
              examples:
                notify_post_1:
                  value : '{
                            "id": 1,
                            "recipients": "test@abc.com",
                            "requestDate": "2019-09-25T09:08:57.515479+00:00",
                            "sentDate": "2019-09-26T09:34:34.792527+00:00",
                            "recipients": "string",
                            "notifyType": {
                                "code": "EMAIL",
                                "desc": "The Email type of notification"
                            },
                             "notifyStatus": {
                                "code": "PENDING",
                                "desc": "Status for the notification pending"
                             },
                             "contents": {
                                "subject": "test notify",
                                "body": "hello world!"
                             }
                          }'

        '400':
          description: BadRequest
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorResponse'

components:
  schemas:
    ErrorResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        code:
          type: string
          description: Identifier representing the type of error that occurred.
        message:
          type: string
          description: Description of the error.
      description: Contains details of an error that was encountered.
    NotifyRequest:
      type: object
      properties:
        recipients:
          type: string
          description: recipient emails
        contents:
          type: object
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/ContentsResquest"
    NotifyResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
          description: id
        requestDate:
          type: string
          description: request date
        sentDate:
          type: string
          description: sent date
        recipients:
          type: string
          description: recipient emails
        contents:
          type: object
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/ContentsResponse"
    ContentsRequest:
      type: object
      properties:
        subject:
          type: string
          description: email subject
        body:
          type: string
          description: email body
        attachment_name:
          type: string
          description: attachment name
        attachment_name:
          type: string
          description: attachment
        attachment_url:
          type: string
          description: attachment link
    ContentsResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        subject:
          type: string
          description: email subject

Error: parse: parse spec: parse components: schemas: "NotifyResponse": parse schema: property "contents": parse schema: object cannot contain 'items' field
